get.description: Returns service request by internal Id

delete.description: Delete a service request object at Cumulocity IoT. Related object at external system will not be deleted!

put.summary: Add alarm reference to service request
put.description: Add alarm reference to service request

409.description: Conflict, Alarm already assigned to service request!

412.description: Precondition Failed, Alarm of service request not found!

put.summary: PUT service request comment by Id
put.description: updates specific service request comment. This operation is only allowed by owner of comment!

delete.summary: DELETE service request comment by Id
delete.description: deletes specific service request comment. This operation is only allowed by owner of comment!

put.summary: UPDATE service request status by Id
UPDATE service request active status by Id

get.description: Returns a list of all service requests in IoT Platform. Additional query parameters allow to filter that list. The default configuration will return all service requests which are not closed! With parameter all=true, all service requests will be returned without fillter.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Filter, returns all service request equal source Id

parameters.name: statusList
parameters.description: Filter, returns all service request with status defined in that list

parameters.name: priorityList
parameters.description: Filter, returns all service request with priority defined in that list

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: filter, "true" returns all service request, "false" (default) returns only active service requests.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Indicates how many entries of the collection shall be returned. The upper limit for one page is 2,000 objects.

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: The current page of the paginated results.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: OrderBy, orders list by status and/or priority and/or timestamp.

parameters.name: withTotalPages
parameters.description: When set to true, the returned result will contain in the statistics object the total number of pages. Only applicable on range queries.

post.description: Creates a new service request object at Cumulocity IoT Platform.

409.description: Conflict, Alarm already assigned to service request!

412.description: Precondition Failed, Alarm of service request not found!

get.summary: Returns all comments of specific service request by internal Id.
get.description: Each service request can have n comments. This endpoint returns the complete list of comments of a specific service request.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Indicates how many entries of the collection shall be returned. The upper limit for one page is 2,000 objects.

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: The current page of the paginated results.

parameters.name: withTotalPages
parameters.description: When set to true, the returned result will contain in the statistics object the total number of pages. Only applicable on range queries.

post.summary: Add new service request comment to specific service request.
post.description: Each service request can have n comments. This endpoint adds a new comment to a specific service request.

get.summary: DOWNLOAD attachment for specific service request

post.summary: UPLOAD attachment for specific service request

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Controls if the attachment can be overwritten. force == true means file will be overwritten if exists, otherwise a http 409 will be returned.

get.description: Returns complete service request status list

post.summary: CREATE or UPDATE service request status list
post.description: Creates or updates complete status list.

get.description: Returns complete list of priorities which are available.

post.summary: CREATE or UPDATE complete priority list
post.description: Creates or updates complete priority list.
Upload attachment for service request comment

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Controls if the attachment can be overwritten. force == true means file will be overwritten if exists, otherwise a http 409 will be returned.

get.summary: GET service request status by Id
get.description: Returns specific service request status by Id

delete.summary: DELETE service request status by Id

get.summary: GET service request priority by ordinal

get.description: Returns a list of all service requests in IoT Platform. Additional query parameter allow to filter that list. Parameter assigned=false returns all service requests which are not yet synchronized to external system. Parameter assigned=true returns all synchronized service requests.

parameters.name: assigned
parameters.description: Filter, assigned == "true" returns all service request with external Id assigned, assigned == "false" returns service requests which doesn't have external Id assigned. If query parameter is not set all service requests will be returned.

parameters.name: serviceRequestIds
parameters.description: Filter by service request IDs, returns all service requests with the IDs defined in that list

get.summary: Returns all user comments of specific service request by internal Id.
get.description: Each service request can have n comments. This endpoint returns the complete list of user comments of a specific service request.

ServiceOrder.description: Service Order object at Cumulocity IoT Platform.

isActive.description: Service request active flag, shows if the service request is active!

externalId.description: Service request external ID, contains the service request object ID of the external system.

ServiceRequestPatchRqBody.description: Service Request object at Cumulocity IoT Platform. This object is the representative / proxy for external system object like ticket, issue, notification, incident etc.. It contains the life cycle information of it, IoT data references (device, alarms, events and measurement) and meta data for the service request like owner, creation time etc.. It has a flexible key & value list "customProperties" to add custom properties as well.

title.example: Device XY is out of order

description.example: Device XY is out of order. Please check energy supply.

isActive.description: Service request active flag, shows if the service request is active!

isClosed.description: Service request closed flag, shows if the service request is closed! This fragment is basicaly used for retention rules.

externalId.description: Service request external ID, contains the service request object ID of the external system.

ServiceRequest.description: Service Request object at Cumulocity IoT Platform. This object is the representative / proxy for external system object like ticket, issue, notification, incident etc.. It contains the life cycle information of it, IoT data references (device, alarms, events and measurement) and meta data for the service request like owner, creation time etc.. It has a flexible key & value list "customProperties" to add custom properties as well.

id.description: Internal id of IoT data object

ServiceRequestDataRef.description: Reference to data at IoT Platform. It can contain an URI with points to a specific object using id, it could also contain a URI with query parameters to reference a list of objects.

id.description: Internal id of IoT data object

ServiceRequestSource.description: Reference to data at IoT Platform. It can contain an URI with points to a specific object using id, it could also contain a URI with query parameters to reference a list of objects.

externalId.description: Service request comment external ID, contains the service request comment object ID of the external system.

isClosed.description: Service request closed flag, shows if the service request comment is closed! This fragment is basicaly used for retention rules.

ServiceRequestCommentRqBody.description: Comment object of service request. Service request object can have n comments.

externalId.description: Service request comment external ID, contains the service request comment object ID of the external system.

isClosed.description: Service request closed flag, shows if the service request comment is closed! This fragment is basicaly used for retention rules.

ServiceRequestComment.description: Comment object of service request. Service request object can have n comments.

ServiceRequestPostRqBody.description: Service Request object at Cumulocity IoT Platform. This object is the representative / proxy for external system object like ticket, issue, notification, incident etc.. It contains the life cycle information of it, IoT data references (device, alarms, events and measurement) and meta data for the service request like owner, creation time etc.. It has a flexible key & value list "customProperties" to add custom properties as well.

alarmStatusTransition.description: Set Alarm status when this status of Service Request status is set. (Transition)

isSynchronisationActive.description: Set Synchronisation status of service request when this status of Service Request status is set. (Transition)

isClosedTransition.description: Closes Service Request when this status of Service Request is set.

isDeactivateTransition.description: Deactivates Service Request when this status of Service Request is set. The service request disappears of the list.

isExcludeForCounter.description: All active (not closed) Service Requests are counted on device manage object. However, with with parameter the status can be excluded and will not be counted!

icon.description: Icon name of the status which should be shown at the UI
